column17:
Weekends can be much more fun if you are dressed for the occasion. This casual earthy shirt from FabIndia is just what you need to make a style statement while having some fun. Its mild green colour and transparent front button give it classic seamless look. Made from high quality breathable linen this half-sleeves shirt is highly comfortable and perfect to be added to your summer wardrobe.

Features

  • Pattern: Pin stripes

  • Sleeves: Half-sleeves

Team it with favourite denims and casual shoes for a complete look.
